description: Not everyone was born to blog, but some people were.

subs.text: I think we should all adopt a NBB and help them get started blogging and tied into the feed network.
We need leaders from outside the geek community. And they need help finding their way through the web of interconnected services.
Open systems are harder to navigate than the silos. This is a fact, always will be so. But a human concierge could mak the difference.
I am sending private pitches to various people offering help.
Ditch the business model. Blogging won't pay for itself that way. But in other ways the benefit is enormous.
